results.overview: In need of funds for research, Dr. Alan Grant accepts a large sum of money to accompany Paul and Amanda Kirby on an aerial tour of the infamous Isla Sorna. It isn't long before all hell breaks loose and the stranded wayfarers must fight for survival as a host of new -- and even more deadly -- dinosaurs try to make snacks of them.
results.title: Jurassic Park III

results.original_title: Jurassic Park III: A Visit To ILM
results.overview: A look at the wizardry of ILM in creating the visual effects of JP III featuring interviews with the VFX artists explaining their techniques. Consisting of 4 parts, Concepts, Process, Muscle Simulation and Composting.
results.title: Jurassic Park III: A Visit To ILM

results.overview: Behind-the-scenes of the dinosaur blockbuster, featuring interviews with the cast, crew and special effects designers.
results.title: The Making of 'Jurassic Park III'
